short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get order delivery address and tracking code faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get order shipping address and tracking code faster.
Features:
   - Get order delivery address and  push to your storage system over api
   - Get the order tracking code from your storage system over api then put to form for submit tracking code

*This extension works based on the amazon website and is not part of amazon
